name: Invader From Space Retro 80s
description:
Once upon a time way before the days of the internet, mobile phones and even before Playstation and Xbox were the handheld video games of the 80's. These were the only portable video games consoles available and were beautifully simple and addictive. Now these days are long gone but you can rewind back in time and bring back some of those memories. These types of machines were made by companies such as Grandstand, Tomy, Entex, CGL, Tandy, Bandai and Epoch to name but a few.. This has been replaced as it simply did not work well on a phone or tablet.
*Screenshots show actual app in action and original artwork based on the original packaging. See how close to the real thing it is!

• Accurate simulation of the classic handheld /desktop machine
• Full retro sounds
• Simple and addictive
• Totally nostalgic

To use:
Press Power
Select Level
Press Start
Steer missile launch pad with left and right buttons
Fire at UFO or invaders before they reach the ground
Avoid fire from invaders
You have beaten the invaders when you reach score 999
You lose if invaders reach ground level or you lose your 5 lives
If using with iCade or compatible controller, press the iCade button on top left and you can now use joystick and red fire(5) button. 
NOTE: pressing this without connection to a compatible Bluetooth controller will bring up the keyboard. If this happens just press the button again to turn it off.
